review: Ğ¨ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ²Ñ€ , Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ° ĞºĞ¾Ğµ-Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¾Ğµ,Ğ½Ğ° Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¾Ğ¼ ÑĞ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ......

Blizzard really fumbled this game hard. Playing OW1 years ago was such a fun experience. Then OW2 comes out and my portrait I worked long to level up is gone, never displaying right in the profile. Heroes are a fucking mess. Microtransactions are astronomical and you can't get "free" skins by playing via boxes anymore. Then they neglected to balance the game for ages. Made zero sense, and their development decisions to this day still make close to little sense. Microtransactions are still predatory, they're clambering to make people happy with PvE, despite clearly not getting dev time to do it *remotely* proper, and still selling it and at a higher price than it's worth. This is one of those games where they truly gave the middle finger to players directly and swirled it around in their mouth, popped it back out and shoved it in their face a few more times. But, plenty of other companies want my money *AKA* ... not blowing up their game with a "sequel", making it fun and also maintaining respect for players by making it viable for years of gameplay.

As someone whos been playing since beta with over 3K hours on both console and PC and 3 time Top500, I can possitively say that the best part of this game is the uninstal button... wanna get into overwatch? FUCKING FONT Try TF2 its much better than this pile of ass
even deadeye hits more often than blizzard makes a good decision
Trash game, community puts more work in telling the truth in reviews then developers put in work to improve the "game"

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

Took my favorite game I spent thousands of hours enjoying and dragged it threw the dirt and left it out to die. horrible balancing horrible monetization systems none of the new maps are fun they're about to pay OWL teams to no longer be a team cause the games so boring and poorly balanced nobody will even watch the best players in the world play it, well formerly best players the actual best overwatch players in the world have moved on to better games that value their time as a player and aren't on the brink of dying. At least now that its on steam people can see how awful the game has become through the negative reviews and the player count numbers which will be embarrassingly low soon enough. They need to stick to milking diablo and wow for all they have left cause nothing else they do works out the people in charge have no idea what they're doing

Overwatch 2 only exists because Blizzard is a greedy company that wanted more microtransaction money from whales.

Loot boxes were free to earn and provided the player with a justification to play the game from season to season. New heroes were FREE for EVERYONE. Now, I don't know if anyone does or doesn't have the new heroes, and that sucks for a game designed around switching heroes to counter other heroes.

Blizzard LIED about PvE being a central feature of Overwatch 2. The new content they've offered is bad. I don't even like the new heroes. The matchmaking in the game is designed to make you win and then make you lose because of the relative skill/experience of your teammates vs. the enemy's teammates is stacked in favor of you and then against you back and forth.

The Blizzard which made OW1 simply doesn't exist anymore. New Blizzard doesn't deserve a dollar from anyone until they drastically change everything wrong with Overwatch 2.
Says 60 fps, but clearly constantly drops to 30 if not less. Absolute stutter fest, I can easily run hunt on highest but this shit cant even run on lowest settings. Disgrace

Blizzard steals your money and hates you
man they even copied the tf2 invasion update, disgraceful
Believe it or not I actually enjoy this game. If I want to play a shooter that requires some actual aim mechanics I can hop on soldier and hard focus my tracking. Its not bad bro.

Spent probably 1000-2000 hours in this game. Solid Shooter.

Bro the game aint even working for me

This game is like an empty bag of chips and you need to pay for each individual chip to be placed in the bag, the problem is that the chips aren't being dished out fast enough so that by the time they finally arrive they are underwhelming and not satisfying. I would rather pay for a full meal, not individual bites served to me months apart.

Opened up for 5 minutes just to say:
[spoiler]Welcome to Team Fortress 2. After nine years in development, hopefully it will have been worth the wait. To listen to a commentary node, put your crosshair over the floating commentary symbol and press your primary fire. To stop a commentary node, put your crosshair over the rotating node and press your primary fire again. Some commentary nodes may take control of the game in order to show something to you. In these cases, simply press your primary fire again to stop the commentary. In addition, your secondary fire will cycle you through all the commentary nodes in the level. Please let me know what you think after you have had a chance to play. I can be reached at gaben@valvesoftware.com, and my favorite class is the Spy. Thanks, and have fun![/spoiler]
